name: Flight Club (Elliott Dahle, Coopal00ps, Pandamander)
description:
✉️ A letter from the instructor:

"So you wanna join Flight Club huh? Well kid...you've got spunk, I'll give you that. I guess you're one of those 'free spirited' types that are all the rage nowadays. Anyways...Flight Club ain't a cakewalk, so you better buckle up. Passion is good, but it'll only get ya so far. It's all about hard work and dedication where I come from. With a little bit of elbow-grease, we'll get you certified in no time. Stick with me, and you'll be a bonafide flight savant if I have anything to say about it. Good luck kid!"

Hi everyone! Flight Club is a small prototype that was born from our love for the Pilotwings game series by Nintendo. We all wore many hats on the project, but Coopal00ps spent most of his time on the art and UI, Pandamander took point on design and also contributed to the art, and Elliott created the character and handled the gameplay programming. We're really proud of this one, and we hope that you enjoy! Now let's see if you can get that "A" rank...🏅

GAME CONTROLS
  • Left arrow / A - rotate left
  • Right arrow / D - rotate right
  • Up arrow / W - rotate thrusters back
  • Down arrow / S - rotate thrusters forward
  • Space - activate thrusters
  • E - air brake
CREDITS

This game is a collaboration between Coopal00ps, Pandamander, and Elliott Dahle. We made it in 30 days for our game-a-month challenge. Follow us for more games every month:
